## Code Examples

Here's some Quarkdown syntax:

```markdown
.function {greet}
    name:
    Hello, **.name**! Welcome to Quarkdown.

.greet {World}
```

And here's JavaScript:

```javascript
function fibonacci(n) {
    if (n <= 1) return n;
    return fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2);
}

console.log(fibonacci(10)); // 55
```
